# DEPARTMENT OF STATE TELEGRAM
**UNCLASSIFIED**

::: {.cable-meta}
:::


1. IN COMMUNIQUE ISSUED BY JOINT COMMAND OF ARMED FORCES
ON JUNE 6, TWENTY-FOUR MILITARY OFFICERS IMPLICATED IN ABORTIVE
COUP ATTEMPT OF JUNE 5 ARE DISMISSED FROM MILITARY SERVICE.
LIST IS HEADED BY LT. COLONEL RAUL LOPEZ LEYTON, NOW IN ASYLUM
AT ARGENTINE EMBASSY AND THREE OTHER LT. COLONELS, PLUS MAJOR
GARY PRADO. PRADO IS CURRENTLY REPORTED TO BE UNDER HOUSE
ARREST. OTHERS IN LIST INCLUDE ANOTHER MAJOR, TWO CAPTAINS,
SIX LIEUTENANTS AND TEN SECOND LIEUTENANTS. COMMUNIQUE, TEXT
OF WHICH IS REPORTED BY SEPTEL, PROMISES THAT ARMED FORCES
"HAVING CONSOLIDATED ESTABLISHED INSTITUTIONAL ORDER" WILL
NOW CONTINUE TO GIVE "FULLEST AND MOST DECIDED SUPPORT" TO
BANZER GOVERNMENT.


2. GOVERNMENT ALSO IS TAKING STRONG MEASURES IN OTHER AREAS
IN WHICH IT RECENTLY FACED POLITICAL OPPOSITION. MANUEL
MORALES DAVILA, PRESIDENT OF CONFEDERATION OF PROFESSIONALS
OF BOLIVIA, WAS EXILED TO ARGENTINA ON JUNE 6 CHARGED WITH
HAVING "DEVELOPED INTENSE POLITICAL ACTIVITY" IN STUDENT
CIRCLES. MORALES, WHO HAD EXPRESSED PUBLIC OPPOSITION TO
GAS SALES CONTRACT WITH BRAZIL, ATTEMPTED TO ACT AS INTER-






 072016Z


MEDIARY BETWEEN STUDENTS OF SAN ANDRES UNIVERSITY (UMSA) AND




                   

                  

UNIVERSITY AUTHORITIES IN RECENT DAYS. HE WAS ARRESTED ON
JUNE 4 FOLLOWING HABEAS CORPUS HEARING FOR SEVERAL IMPRISONED
STUDENTS.


3. ALSO ON JUNE 6, MINISTRY OF INTERIOR ACCUSED UMSA INTER-
FACULTY COMMITTEE OF INVOLVMENT WITH CONSPIRATORIAL GROUPS.
MINISTRY WARNED IT WOULD PUNISH COMMITTEE MEMBERS "WITH MAXIMUM
ENERGY." NONETHELESS, DESPITE THIS WARNING AND THREAT BY UMSA
AUTHORITIES THAT STUDENTS WHO FAIL TO RETURN TO CLASSES JUNE 7
WILL LOSE CREDIT FOR CURRENT SEMESTER, INTER-FACULTY COMMITTEE
HAS ISSUED ANOTHER STATEMENT DECLARING CONTINUATION OF UNIV-
ERSITY STUDENT STRIKE, NOW IN ITS FOURTEENTH DAY. SECONDARY
STUDENTS OF LA PAZ ALSO HAVE DECLARED RENEWED STRIKE COMMENCING
ON JUNE 7. RENE SORIA GALVARRO, PRESIDENT OF INTER-FACULTY
COMMITTEE OF UMSA, REPORTEDLY ESCAPED FROM POLICE CUSTODY
DURING CONFUSED EVENTS OF JUNE 5 COUP ATTEMPT AND IS NOW IN
HIDING.
BREWIN
